title: Compile error with const generics
body:
Sorry in advance, might just be me missing something but it feels like this should not happen. I tried the following code in both [tests/test.rs](https://github.com/usbalbin/iter_fixed/blob/wonkyness/tests/test.rs#L37) and [src/lib.rs](https://github.com/usbalbin/iter_fixed/blob/wonkyness/src/lib.rs#L12) and get different results: ```rust let res: [_; 2] = [1u32, 2, 3, 4] .into_iter_fixed() .zip([4u32, 3, 2, 1]) .map(|(a, b)| a + b) .skip::<1>() .take::<2>() .collect(); ``` I expected everything to compile fine. Instead, `cargo build` succeeds however running `cargo test` fails compile [tests/test.rs](https://github.com/usbalbin/iter_fixed/blob/wonkyness/tests/test.rs#L37) The errors started after I updated my compiler. I unfortunately do not remember the old version. However after I updated I know I started getting warnings about `array::IntoIter` now being stabilized as well as warning about [private_in_public](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/34537):
private_in_public warning

``` warning: private type `fn(usize, usize) -> usize {min}` in public interface (error E0446) --> src/lib.rs:63:5 | 63 | pub fn take(self) -> IteratorFixed, { min(TAKE, N) }> { | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(private_in_public)]` on by default = warning: this was previously accepted by the compiler but is being phased out; it will become a hard error in a future release! = note: for more information, see issue #34537 ```

The warning about `private_in_public` disappeared after making the const functions used for computing the const generics public. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.52.0-nightly (94736c434 2021-02-27) binary: rustc commit-hash: 94736c434ee154b30e2ec22ec112b79e3f6c5884 commit-date: 2021-02-27 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.52.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0.1 ```
Compile error

``` error[E0277]: the trait bound `[_; 2]: FromIteratorFixed, std::array::IntoIter>, [closure@tests/test.rs:40:14: 40:28]>>>, {_: usize}>` is not satisfied --> tests/test.rs:43:10 | 43 | .collect(); | ^^^^^^^ the trait `FromIteratorFixed, std::array::IntoIter>, [closure@tests/test.rs:40:14: 40:28]>>>, {_: usize}>` is not implemented for `[_; 2]` | = help: the following implementations were found: <[::Item; N] as FromIteratorFixed> error: aborting due to previous error ```
